title: First Mover Americas: Bitcoin Dominance Continues to Climb
description: The latest price moves in bitcoin (BTC) and crypto markets in context for Oct. 10, 2023. First Mover is CoinDesk’s daily newsletter that contextualizes the latest actions in the crypto markets.

title: JOE Sinks as Retailer Trader Joe’s Sues Namesake DEX
description: Grocery chain Trader Joe’s alleged the Trader Joe exchange chose a similar name to benefit from the former’s popularity.

title: Israeli authorities redirects frozen Hamas cryptocurrency funding to state treasury
description:
Israeli authorities reportedly “located and froze” cryptocurrency accounts belonging to the Hamas group with assistance from Binance, local media outlet Calcalist reported on Oct. 10. As per the report, Israel’s Lahav 433 police unit collaborated with the nation’s defense ministry and other intelligence agencies to track the group’s cryptocurrency fundraising accounts, and the seized funds […]

The post Israeli authorities redirects frozen Hamas cryptocurrency funding to state treasury appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Crypto Influencer Lists 20 Reasons to Be Optimistic About XRP, From Legal Clarity to Strong Community Support
description: Introduction On 10 October 2023, well-known crypto influencer “Crypto Assets Guy” took to social media platform X (formerly known as Twitter) to share a comprehensive list of 20 reasons why he is extremely optimistic about XRP, the digital asset associated with Ripple. His arguments range from the asset’s legal standing in the United States to […]

title: Binance’s $1b recovery fund plummets to just $32m
description: Binance CEO Changpeng Zhao’s industry recovery initiative (IRI), which boasted over $1 billion in its fund, has dwindled to a mere $32 million balance despite less than $30 million deployed. Zhao held the mantle of industry savior following the FTX…

title: Bitcoin dominance surges. Will the BTC price go up?
description: As Bitcoin’s dominance rises, it could hint at a bullish wave of BTC price as 2024 halving approaches. We asked experts to get insights.

title: Whales Accumulate 26.7% of XRP With Transactions on the Ledger Dwindling, How?
description:
Market intelligent platform for on-chain and social metrics, Santiment tweeted that the XRP ledger has seen less activity compared to 2021 and 2022. However, this has not stopped the Whales and the Sharks from accumulating XRP. Wallets with 100K-100M $XRP hold $7.89B in coins at present while a year ago it was $7.16B.  As such, […]

The post Whales Accumulate 26.7% of XRP With Transactions on the Ledger Dwindling, How? appeared first on Coin Edition.
